amendment.description: To modify the requirements for the content of the report on compliance with the Detainee Treatment Act of 2005.

vote.text: Amendment SA 872 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 872 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562) To modify the requirements for the content of the report on compliance with the Detainee Treatment Act of 2005.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 872 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 872 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
